description:
Computer Basics: Understanding your computer and Getting help!

The Goal of this course is in 3 sections:

You will get to know the hardware that makes your computer what it is

You will learn Tips and shortcuts that can make the computer easier to use

You will have a understanding how to work with Information Technology staff to ease frustration, This short course is to help anyone work with a computer in a basic fashion and the it staff that look like mircale workers.

Over all this course is designed to improve you overall computer users experience!!!
title: Computer Basics - A Beginners Guide to the Computer
instructors: Fenix Rising Consultant LLC Michael Meyer
